template.name: Pocketbook
template.descr: 32 pages pocketbook template,10,5000 cm x 14,8000 cm, front cover, back cover, 1,4112 cm margins & 1,0000 cm bleeds, publisher's logo area, left/right/blank master pages, text frames, images frames, based on the pocketbooks of glarolykoi.net.
template.usage: Free to use template for pocketbooks.
template.author: Christos Koulaxizis
